name: Spectator
pages: A Spectator is a small aberration that spawns in the deep depths of the Underworld or in the Nether. It is the smallest of the beholderkin aberrations. It cannot summon minions, but relies are paralyzing its foes and using its powerful bite.

$(l)Number$(): 1$(br)$(l)Size$(): Small$(br)$(l)Level$(): Mob$(br)$(l)Rarity$(): Scarce$(br)$(l)Movement$(): Flies/Hovers$(br)$(l)Speed$(): Normal$(br)$(l)Health$(): 16hp$(br)$(l)Damage/Strength$(): 4hp$(br)$(l)Daylight$(): Yes$(br)$(l)Despawn$(): Yes$(br)$(l)Spawns$(): Underworld, Nether
$(l)Weapons/Specials$():$(br)- Can cast $(l:paralysis)Paralysis$() spell.$(br)- Charges at its target.
